title.en: Prayer to the Chain of Rebirths

text.en: In the past, in the noble land of India, you were the arhat Sagilha,
text.en-trans: ngön tsé pak yul drachom sa gi lha

text.en: In Padmasambhava’s presence, you were the lord Dorje Dudjom,
text.en-trans: pemé chen ngar dorje düdjom jé

text.en: As the head of the Sakya, you were the glorious Kunga Gyaltsen,1
text.en-trans: sakya gong du kunga gyaltsen pal

text.en: At Geden Ling, you were the noble Gelek Palzang,2
text.en-trans: genden ling du gelek palzang zhap

text.en: And in Minyak, you were Kunzang Chödrak—3
text.en-trans: minyak yul du kunzang chödrak sok

text.en: Taking the form of such learned and accomplished masters,
text.en-trans: khé dang drup nyé du mé tsul zung né

text.en: You spread the Buddha’s teachings—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: tupten gyépar dzé la solwa dep

text.en: Now, you have been cared for by many teachers,
text.en-trans: data shenyen mangpö jé su zung

text.en: And applied the key points of study, reflection and meditation.
text.en-trans: tö sam gompé jangwa né du nün

text.en: The blessings of Mipham Gyatso have entered your heart,
text.en-trans: mipam gyatsö chinlap nying la zhuk

text.en: And you bring benefit to countless beings—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: drang yé dro dön dzé la solwa dep

text.en: In future, you will manifest as Karmavajra,
text.en-trans: ma ong rikden drakpö makpön chok

text.en: The supreme commander to Kalkin Raudra Cakrin,4and so on,
text.en-trans: lekyi dorjé la sok trulpa yi

text.en: In this way, you will continue to work for beings for as long as space exists,
text.en-trans: namkha si du drowé dön dzépé

text.en: To you, my only refuge, noble guru, I pray!
text.en-trans: kyab chik lama jé la solwa dep

text.en: Having reached the limit of one’s own benefit through study, reflection and meditation,
text.en-trans: rangdön tö sam gompa taru khyöl

text.en: One acts for others’ sake, through explanation, debate and composition is extensive,
text.en-trans: zhen dön ché tsö tsompé trinlé gyé

text.en: Having set out upon the path of twofold benefit through study, practice and activity,
text.en-trans: nyi dön shédrup lé kyi söl tö né

text.en: May I attain enlightenment inseparably from you, the supreme guide!
text.en-trans: dren chok khyé dang yermé sangyé shok
